name: Tomb Raider I
description:
This script will assist you to install this game on Linux OS:
"Tomb Raider I" provided by GOG using OpenLara project https://github.com/XProger/OpenLara
During install please let all options by default.
Thanks to the people who helped us play this game in the best conditions on Linux platform.
notes:
- x360 controller compatible.
- known issue:
-- For the moment this script will install and use only english audio tracks. But you could choose menus and subtitles in your preferred language in OpenLara sound options parameters.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

files.gogsetup: N/A:Select the Windows installer file in exe format downloaded from your GOG account

content:
custom-name: Tomb Raider I - GOG - OpenLara
files:
- tr1audio: https://github.com/Carlmundo/TombRaider-AutomatedFix/archive/master.zip
- cdrtools: https://github.com/legluondunet/mlls-tools/raw/master/cdrtools/cdrtools.zip
- opl: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20I/openlara.tar.xz
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- script: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20I/clean_openlara.sh
- audiotools: https://github.com/legluondunet/mlls-tools/raw/master/audiotools/audiotools.tar.xz
- gogsetup: N/A:Select the Windows installer file in exe format downloaded from your
    GOG account
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/OpenLara
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$gogsetup"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/app
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: tr1audio
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/audio/1
    src: $CACHE/TombATI/Music/
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/audio/1
    src: audiotools
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: cdrtools
- chmodx: script
- execute:
    file: script
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: opl
